column4: hey any ubuntu 3D nerds in here...I was wondering if I could use my spare linux box in my bedroom to assist my windows pc with rendering in 3dsmax
segbsebseb: no but i always hear about ppl using nix boxes to help render
I think they are using linux right from the get-go.  Not using linux to supplement a windows render.
no max for loonix though...theres like no 3d progarms for linux...that are any good
